title: Downfall: Taric sneak peek?
body:
This video just popped up. It shows a snowy mountain (with something that seems Targon-like design) and a sapphire ring (or a crown as suggested by [OurLestrade](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/5uKBIWvN-downfall-taric-sneak-peek?comment=0002)) falling down.


https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B1O0R0t6zdI

_"To ascend the Mountain, I had to let go..."
_

replies.body: This is outrageous.
{{champion:44}} Truly...
Truly...

{{champion:44}} Truly... Ourageous!

And cold too with all that snow :<
I know right. I am wondering what they will do to taric, considering im a lvl 5 taric with every taric skin except bloodstone cause i dislike it. {{champion:44}}
Too bad because Reds said that Bloodstone is going to be his "Badass" skin :P
Nope. Sorry this is the new Elsa Frozen teaser.

Turns out Taric is in fact a gem, and his human form is just a hologram projected from the gem i.e Steven Universe/Crystal Gems.
Mostly likely not, but oh man, do I wish it.

Honestly more like someone ascended Mt Targon and the Celestial Aspect of fabulousness  awarded/sent Taric the ring

I was hoping for him to be a real Targonian since we had already 3 ppl ascending the Mountain.

{{champion:136}} Typical Targon redundancy...
{{champion:202}} There must be four.
[Deleted]
Its a dorans ring for sure {{item:1056}}

> [{quoted}](name=PrimeSchnitzel,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=5uKBIWvN,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-03-29T12:54:45.301+0000)
>
> Its a dorans ring for sure {{item:1056}}

This guy gets it. Doran would be a cool new champ. I can't wait to see what it is (support please!)
Indeed xD a blacksmith/crafter champion could be some innovative shizle.
He can upgrade your items 3 times.

{{champion:202}} _Upgrade my IE , Statikk and Essence Reaver please!_

Doran: _K_

{{champion:202}} _Laugh maniacally and proceeds to one-shot the enemy ADC_

Jhin would be disgusted, not pleased.

Take a good look at what he said again.

> [{quoted}](name=RookPusher,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=5uKBIWvN,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-03-29T13:04:16.551+0000)
>
> This guy gets it. Doran would be a cool new champ. I can't wait to see what it is (support please!)

New Doran champ ....  passive at 20 minutes you can sell him and trade him in for a real champ.
IIRC the story of Doran was that he suffered brain damage from getting kicked in the head by a mule, meaning his weapons are shit cause the brain damage lost his skills.
Its his engagement ring for [redacted]
{{champion:44}} {{champion:81}}
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}

{{champion:44}} _"Sapphire... for divinity"_

On a more serious note... The place is most probably targon and Taric is 99% from there now. Plus the focus is on the ring gem.
Wow, you even beat Sharjo and Surrender@20 to punch on this one. XD
God bless Youtube suggested videos and my luck on browsing it xD
Sometimes a man has to work to make a living dammit.
all I ask for is that he knows his old kit and WILLINGLY gave it up to get this new kit and it's part of his story. {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
Haha that would be great!
That would be damn awesome!

I figured it out!
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jewel_Master

[https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/c/c6/Jewel_Master.jpg](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jewel_Master)

It all makes sense now...

https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/147042140009136128/164428666963492865/Itallmakessense.png

I believe you mean, http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/4/43/Prospector%27s_Ring_item.png/revision/latest?cb=20131123191624 Prospector's Ring ;)  cause it has more that look then a Doran's Ring {{item:1056}} .
Dominion return confirmed {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Maybe it's that circlet that Taric wears around his head? It looks very large to be a ring :O
Certainly could be the headpiece he has. Definitely mysterious!

He had to "let go"... 

Frozen memes inc.

"It's cold outside on the mountain..."

"Let it go..."

Taric is Elsa, confirmed.
{{champion:44}} "More than just precious stones. I bring you an ancient power."
Wait...IS TARIC NO LONGER ABOUT GEMS?!
he IS gems
"I became Gems, destroyer of fabulousness" {{champion:44}}
I said it before and I'll say it again. Patch 6.8 will be The Outrageous patch

> [{quoted}](name=Blue Moon Wolf,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=5uKBIWvN,comment-id=000d,timestamp=2016-03-29T16:27:39.788+0000)
>
> I said it before and I'll say it again. Patch 6.8 will be The Truly,Truly,Truly Outrageous patch

FTFY m8.

he had to let go of his armor?

are we gonna see a taric wearing nothing but a speedo now?
Pool Party Taric confirmed.
